content.rendered:
Unique Air is a privately-owned aircraft operating company founded in 2007. With offices and operational centers in two of the major provinces in South Africa, we are strategically positioned to connect any two destinations in Southern Africa utilizing a variety of turboprop aircraft and private jets.

Unique Air South Africa Address, Phone, Email, Fax

Address: 3, highlands Centre, Vergenoeg Rd & Plaston Road, Wild Fig Country Estate, White River, 1240

View location of Unique Air South Africa on google maps

Phone: +27 79 198 8228

Email: info@uniqueair.co.za

Unique Air South Africa Quotations and Reservations

For any questions or assistance regarding Quotations and Reservations at Unique Air, please contact through

Quotations and Reservations: +27 12 345 3121, +27 79 198 8228

Fax: +27 86 219 9877

Email: reservations@uniqueair.co.za

Unique Air South Africa Operations

To contact Unique Air Operations team, please contact through

Phone: +27 82 444 7996

Fax: +27 86 268 8450

Email: thomas@uniqueair.co.za

UniqueAir Official Website: https://www.uniqueair.co.za/

Book UniqueAir by requesting a quote: http://www.uniqueair.co.za/request-quote.html

By UniqueAir, you can use it for

  • Safari travel
  • Corporate travel
  • Group travel
  • VIP travel
  • Private charter

Types of Fleet available with UniqueAir:

  • Boeing 737-500
  • Challenger 350
  • Learjet 45
  • Nextant 400
  • Beechcraft 1900
  • King Air 350
  • King Air 200
  • Pilatus PC-12
  • Cessna Caravan
  • Baron 58

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Unique Air South Africa Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with Unique Air South Africa: (click on the stars below)
